latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Doors in an egres observed with locks do not operate with a single motion in direction of egress nooks eyes and other locking devises observed exit door less than 28 inches wide
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers not provided have not been inspected and tagged prior to camp season
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Sufficient handwash sinks with hot and cold running water liquid soap drying devices not provided in comercial buildings
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Emergency lighting in halls stairs not provided where required
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Building and other structures observed unsafe inadequate in size and unclean do not have watertight roof and sides
